recipes.title: Chicken Rice
recipes.instructions: boil chicken in water. Add some garlic. flatten one small piece of chicken breast. Serves 50.

recipes.title: bag of chips
recipes.instructions: Put some chips in a bag of air. *Important* Never fill more than 1/4 of the bag.

recipes.title: Fish & Chips
recipes.instructions: Fry fish. Make sure not to put any seasoning. At best salt and pepper. British things...

recipes.title: Fried rice
recipes.ingredients: Rice and anything left in the fridge

recipes.title: Maggi Mee
recipes.instructions: Not possible to go wrong. Nobody can screw this up.
